frontmatter.title: Juggling + Solving 3 Rubik's cubes
frontmatter.excerpt: And you thought one Rubik's cube was hard?

pageProps.content:
## Are you kidding me?

He solves three Rubik's cubes while juggling. Check out [the video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q6AsllXpKBU) which includes some _slowmo_.

This kid has:

1. Skills
2. The will to win
3. A dope bow tie
